text: int main ( ) { int t ; int r ; int a [ 103 ] [ 6000 ] ; int b [ 103 ] [ 6000 ] ; int i , j ; int k ; int p ; int max ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t > 0 ) { scanf ( "%d" , & r ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < r ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < i + 1 ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; b [ i ] [ j ] = 0 ; } } b [ 0 ] [ 0 ] = a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ; for ( i = 1 ; i < r ; i ++ ) { p = 0 ; for ( j = 0 ; j < i ; j ++ ) { for ( k = 0 ; k < 2 ; k ++ ) { p = b [ i - 1 ] [ j ] + a [ i ] [ j + k ] ; if ( p > b [ i ] [ j + k ] ) { b [ i ] [ j + k ] = p ; } } } } max = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < r ; i ++ ) { if ( b [ r - 1 ] [ i ] > max ) { max = b [ r - 1 ] [ i ] ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , max ) ; t -- ; } return 0 ; }
